description:
1. version
kilo 2015.1.0

2. Relevant log files:

nova-compute.log on source host

2015-12-18 14:55:39.583 9460 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-f31be19a-761b-47e9-91c2-2a2565579b19 f04e318acd7e4e5093c91e6dc74a28c3 53adc6d6825b43378d6ab89fc38051da - - -] [instance: 7db6251d-bc43-4a50-8a41-dd84795500c4] Live Migration failure: internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe
2015-12-18 14:55:40.046 9460 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-f31be19a-761b-47e9-91c2-2a2565579b19 f04e318acd7e4e5093c91e6dc74a28c3 53adc6d6825b43378d6ab89fc38051da - - -] [instance: 7db6251d-bc43-4a50-8a41-dd84795500c4] Migration operation has aborted

libvirt.log
2015-12-18 06:55:39.574+0000: 4795: warning : qemuMigrationBeginPhase:2737 : NBD in tunnelled migration is currently not supported
2015-12-18 06:55:39.581+0000: 4795: error : virNetClientProgramDispatchError:177 : internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe
2015-12-18 09:45:46.211+0000: 4793: warning : qemuMigrationBeginPhase:2737 : NBD in tunnelled migration is currently not supported
2015-12-18 09:45:46.217+0000: 4793: error : virNetClientProgramDispatchError:177 : internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe


3. Reproduce steps:
create a new instance from image in cells, then live-migration this instance

Expected result:
live-migration success 

Actual result:
live-migration failed , Log in the second quarter

4.
Looks like libvirt  currently does not support live-migration in cell environment.
Or is this a bug ?
title: live-migration  instance  failed

comments.content:
1. version
kilo 2015.1.0

2. Relevant log files:

nova-compute.log on source host

2015-12-18 14:55:39.583 9460 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-f31be19a-761b-47e9-91c2-2a2565579b19 f04e318acd7e4e5093c91e6dc74a28c3 53adc6d6825b43378d6ab89fc38051da - - -] [instance: 7db6251d-bc43-4a50-8a41-dd84795500c4] Live Migration failure: internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe
2015-12-18 14:55:40.046 9460 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [req-f31be19a-761b-47e9-91c2-2a2565579b19 f04e318acd7e4e5093c91e6dc74a28c3 53adc6d6825b43378d6ab89fc38051da - - -] [instance: 7db6251d-bc43-4a50-8a41-dd84795500c4] Migration operation has aborted

libvirt.log
2015-12-18 06:55:39.574+0000: 4795: warning : qemuMigrationBeginPhase:2737 : NBD in tunnelled migration is currently not supported
2015-12-18 06:55:39.581+0000: 4795: error : virNetClientProgramDispatchError:177 : internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe
2015-12-18 09:45:46.211+0000: 4793: warning : qemuMigrationBeginPhase:2737 : NBD in tunnelled migration is currently not supported
2015-12-18 09:45:46.217+0000: 4793: error : virNetClientProgramDispatchError:177 : internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe


3. Reproduce steps:
create a new instance from image in cells, then live-migration this instance

Expected result:
live-migration success 

Actual result:
live-migration failed , Log in the second quarter

4.
Looks like libvirt  currently does not support live-migration in cell environment.
Or is this a bug ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~nail-i

comments.content: Based on the errors in the libvirt logs this does not appear to be a cells related issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alaski

comments.content:
Could you describe your environment? Libvirt compares platform ID of source and destination prior to live migration to check if you are not trying to live migrate to the same host. Here you got an exception from libvirt:

internal error: Attempt to migrate guest to the same host d4c24b59-ac1e-4d58-b4db-876b2b166abe

Nova internally checks whether provided destination is not the same as source:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conductor/tasks/live_migrate.py#L107
The same applies when scheduler is involved:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/conductor/tasks/live_migrate.py#L164
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pawel-koniszewski

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
